channel.title: Cdn on Software Architecture And Development from the Trenches
channel.description: Recent content in Cdn on Software Architecture And Development from the Trenches

item.title: CDN Origin Server Redirector Technique
item.description: Problem I had the joy of setting up a CDN configuration in Akamai. Though it wasn’t that bad, the rarity of that task made me never want to do it twice. I only really needed to CDN cache static assets, and chose to harden the rules for anyone that wanted to use my configuration. This is a continuation on the previous post on our simple redirector technique. The CDN Configuration Rules.
